objective: Make this fork pass RunPod Hub serverless listing requirements while keeping fork-only governance and secure defaults.
scope: Add required .runpod/tests.json, keep serverless handler discoverability intact, add fork badge to root README, and preserve no-secret test config for safe public listing metadata.
acceptance_criteria: File .runpod/tests.json exists with valid JSON schema-compatible test entries and non-secret environment values.
Legacy path .runpod/tests_json is removed to avoid Hub validation misses caused by wrong filename.
Root README.md contains the fork badge URL for 4nibhal/nibble-worker-vllm.
src/handler.py remains the active RunPod serverless entrypoint for Docker CMD execution.
rollback_plan: Revert the commit that adds .runpod/tests.json, removes .runpod/tests_json, and updates README badge + request contract.
deploy_plan: Apply and validate only in this fork, then create a GitHub release in this fork so RunPod Hub can ingest the listing changes.
threat_model: Primary risks are secret leakage in test metadata and mis-detected serverless readiness from incorrect filenames; mitigated by explicit non-secret env examples and canonical .runpod/tests.json path.
